title: Intro to TensorFlow Recommenders (Building recommendation systems with TensorFlow)
excerpt: In this video, we will introduce you to TensorFlow Recommenders, an elegant and powerful library for building recommendation systems. We will first explore MovieLens dataset and then show you how to use TensorFlow Recommenders to build a basic retrieval model.  TensorFlow Recommenders homepage â†’ https://goo.gle/2IJAkrK
